basics.name: Prayag Das
basics.label: Entry Level Software Developer, B.S. in Computer Science - University of Hawaii at Manoa
basics.summary: I have recently completed my Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, Department of Information and Computer Sciences. I have two years of experience in UX/UI design and have contributed in both volunteer and paid leadership roles. I have hosted several workshops for students to promote team-building, collaboration, strong UI design practices, and strong communication skills.

work.summary: Development of software using frameworks like AngularJS and ReactJS
highlights: I really enjoyed working with a group of new and seasoned web developers. I learned a lot about UI design with React, effective communication, and team app development.

volunteer.organization: Association of Computing Machinery, UH Manoa Student Chapter (ACM Manoa)
volunteer.summary: I managed technical resources and maintained the website for the team. I also led a small software development team, guiding students in creating web applications for ACM Manoa clubs.
highlights: This experience helped me sharpen my leadership skills, and I learned a lot about teaching and facilitating group activities.

volunteer.organization: FRC(FIRST Robotics Competition) Team 971 Spartan Robotics
volunteer.summary: Liason with the High School and Lab schedule management
highlights: Interface with the school and the ASB Council of Presidents
